column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: hazard. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix hazard: <http://www.example.org/hazard#> .hazard:   a owl:Ontology ;  rdfs:comment "A simple ontology of hazards"@en .hazard:Hazard   a owl:Class ;  rdfs:label "Hazard"@en ;  rdfs:comment "A hazard is a potential source of harm or adverse health effect on a person or persons."@en .hazard:NaturalHazard   a owl:Class ;  rdfs:label "Natural Hazard"@en ;  rdfs:comment "Natural hazards are naturally occurring physical phenomena"@en ;  rdfs:subClassOf hazard:Hazard .hazard:ManmadeHazard   a owl:Class ;  rdfs:label "Man-made Hazard"@en ;  rdfs:comment "Man-made hazards are events that are caused by humans and occur in or close to human settlements."@en ;  rdfs:subClassOf hazard:Hazard .hazard:hasSeverity  a owl:ObjectProperty ;  rdfs:label "has severity"@en ;  rdfs:comment "The property that relates a hazard to its severity."@en ;  rdfs:domain hazard:Hazard ;  rdfs:range xsd:int .hazard:hasLikelihood  a owl:ObjectProperty ;  rdfs:label "has likelihood"@en ;  rdfs:comment "The property that relates a hazard to its likelihood of occurrence."@en ;  rdfs:domain hazard:Hazard ;  rdfs:range xsd:int .hazard:hasImpact  a owl:ObjectProperty ;  rdfs:label "has impact"@en ;  rdfs:comment "The property that relates a hazard to its potential impact."@en ;  rdfs:domain hazard:Hazard ;  rdfs:range xsd:string .
